entry.title: IPSI
entry.content: IPSI 配置范例：C:> arp -d //清除arp缓存 C:> telnet 192.11.13.6 //telnet到ipsi ipsilogin Login:craft //帐号 Password:serv1ces //密码 [IPADMIN]:set control interface 192.168.40.21 255.255.255.0 //配置控制接口IP [IPADMIN]:set control gateway 192.168.40.1 //配置控制接口网关 [IPADMIN]:exit //退出 重新连接查看网络配置 [IPADMIN]:show control interface //查看配置信息是否生效 Control Network IP Address = 10.228.64.31 Control Network Subnetmask = 255.255.252.0 Control Network Default Gateway = 10.228.64.1 IPSI is not configured for DHCP IP address administration 配置速率、双工,port 1为网络端口，port 2为service端口 [IPADMIN]:set port negotiation 1 disable //关闭自适应 [IPADMIN]:set port speed 1 100MB //设置100M [IPADMIN]:set port duplex 1 full //设置全双工 [IPADMIN]:reset //保存配置 重新连接查看配置是否生效 [IPADMIN]:show port 1 //查看控制接口速率 Link:established Authonegotiation: disabled Speed:100Mb Duplex: full Flow control: disabled change system-parameters ipserver-interface Page 1 of 1 IP SERVER INTERFACE (IPSI) SYSTEM PARAMETERS SERVER INFORMATION Primary Control Subnet Address: Secondary Control Subnet Address: OPTIONS Switch Identifier: A IPSI Control of Port Networks: enabled A-side IPSI Preference: enabled IPSI Socket Sanity Timeout: 15 QoS PARAMETERS 802.1p: 6 DiffServ: 46 add ipserver-interface 1 //CM下添加IPSI IP SERVER INTERFACE (IPSI) ADMINISTRATION - PORT NETWORK 1 IP Control? y Ignore Connectivity in Server Arbitration? n Encryption? n Administer secondary ip server interface board? y PRIMARY IPSI QoS AND ETHERNET SETTINGS Location: 1A01 Use System Level Parameter Values? y Subnet Mask: /22 802.1p: 6 IP Address: 10.228.64.31 DiffServ: 46 Gateway: 10.228.64.1 Auto? n Speed: 100Mbps Duplex: Full SECONDARY IPSI QoS AND ETHERNET SETTINGS Location: 1B01 Use System Level Parameter Values? y Subnet Mask: /22 802.1p: 6 IP Address: 10.228.64.32 DiffServ: 46 Gateway: 10.228.64.1 Auto? n Speed: 100Mbps Duplex: Full list ipserver-interface //查看IPSI板卡状态 IP SERVER INTERFACE INFORMATION Port Pri/ Primary/ Primary/ Primary/ State Of Ntwk Sec Secondary Secondary Secondary Serv Control Health Num Bd Loc IP Address Host Name DHCP ID State State C P E G 1 1A01 10.228.64.31 10.228.64.31 ipsi-A01a IN actv-aa 0.0.0.0 1B01 10.228.64.32 10.228.64.32 ipsi-A01b IN standby 0.0.0.0 配置完毕，通过CM访问IPSI ipsisession -d -c 01a //禁用ipsi访问 ipsisession -c 01a //启用ipsi访问，并记录随机密码 ssh init@ipsi-a01a //SSH连接到IPSI IPSI恢复出厂设置重新插拔板卡，当LED显示字母闪动时按一下reset，设置成A，等待3秒后自动调整到第二位字符，设置成0，再过3秒把第三位也设置成0即可

entry.title: gateway network config
entry.content: G4301234567891011set port redundancy 10/3 10/4 on "1"set port spantree disable 10/3set port spantree disable 10/4set port negotiation 10/3 disableSet port duplex 10/3 fullset port speed 10/3 100MBset port name 10/3 Activeset port negotiation 10/4 disableSet port duplex 10/4 fullset port speed 10/4 100MB set port name 10/4 Standby G4501234567891011set port redundancy 10/5 10/6 on "1"set port spantree disable 10/5set port spantree disable 10/6set port negotiation 10/5 disableSet port duplex 10/5 fullset port speed 10/5 1GBset port name 10/5 Activeset port negotiation 10/6 disableSet port duplex 10/6 fullset port speed 10/6 1GB set port name 10/6 Standby

entry.title: slsconfig
entry.content: Config sls analog1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344454647484950set sls enableshow sysset pim-lockout yesset max-ip-registrations 150set date-format dd/mm/yyset ip-codec-set g.711muexitshow mg list_configslsset slot-config v2 mm711set fac ars1 9set fac ars2 8set fac hold *30show facstation 1313 analogset port v208set cor unrestrictedset trunk-destination yesset name xxxxshowexitstation 1314 ipset password 1234exittrunk-group 1 loop-startset tac #1set dial dtmfadd port v201add port v202add port v203add port v204set busy-disconnect yesset incoming-destination 1313set name XXXXshowexitdial-pattern 1set type hnpaset max-length 11set max-length 11set tgnum 1set deny noexitshow dianl //0-9exitset sls disableset sls enablecopy ruanning-config startup-configshow faultshow sls

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick Starth1 woainih2 wo bu aini wo hen ainiCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
